jmap_move_emails.description:
Move emails to folder. Specify destination by name or ID.

    Use mailbox names like 'trash', 'archive', 'inbox' or IDs from
    jmap_list_mailboxes. Moves all specified emails in batch.

    Args:
        params: JmapMoveEmailsInput containing:
            - email_ids: List of email IDs to move (required)
            - mailbox: Destination folder name or ID (required)
            - account: Email account (optional)

    Returns:
        Confirmation of moved emails.
